thread.title: Bill O’Reilly: Trump Can Win the Culture War as Long as He Sticks to the Facts
thread.title_full: Bill O’Reilly: Trump Can Win the Culture War as Long as He Sticks to the Facts

author: Josh Feldman
title: Bill O’Reilly: Trump Can Win the Culture War as Long as He Sticks to the Facts
text:
video Bill O’Reilly: Trump Can Win the Culture War as Long as He Sticks to the Facts by Josh Feldman | 8:29 pm, February 21st, 2017 
Bill O’Reilly said tonight President Trump has an opportunity to win the culture war, but to do so he has to stick to the facts. 
He brought up the Sweden controversy from this past weekend and said that because Trump’s words “were not precise,” he got roundly hammered. 
O’Reilly argued that if Trump sticks to the facts when it comes to matters of immigration, he wins, because most Americans are on his side and aren’t happy with how Democrats are handling the issue. 
He also argued that because Barack Obama saw America as a flawed nation, a “negative view of the USA sunk in,” but now the country has a president with a more positive view. 
O’Reilly concluded that Trump can win the culture war, “but in order to do that, discipline and facts must dominate the discourse. Facts, not opinion, will trump propaganda.” 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
